name: The Forgotten Isles
description:
The Forgotten Isles is a fast-paced action platformer. Explore three scenic worlds, navigate your way past obstacles, complete levels as fast as possible, and discover the secret of The Forgotten Isles.

Key Features

- 3 Atmospheric and precarious worlds to explore and race across against the clock

- 30 Unique levels to test your platforming skills

- Complex mechanics that allow you to beat the level the way you choose

- A speed-running timer for you to race yourself

- Fluid movement for complete character control

- Xbox Controller Support
